item.title: Nayara Energy Names New Chief Executive After Former CEO Resigns
item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of its previous CEO

item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of its previous CEO

item.description: A Indian refinery part-owned by Russia’s Rosneft PJSC tightened conditions for selling products after the European Union imposed sanctions on the company, highlighting the fallout for the processor, i

item.title: EU Sanctions Against India’s Nayara ‘Unjustified,’ Rosneft Says
item.description: Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.

item.title: EU Sanctions Against India’s Nayara ‘Unjustified,’ Rosneft Says
item.description: Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.
